item.description:
Lets get together for the 90th annual St. Anthony's Feast!

Opening ceremonies are at 7pm. Let's meet between 6 and 6.15 on the Greenway. We will then head over to the North End to watch the procession and to get some great food.

Bring your appetite and cash for the vendors.

See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: I will send out the exact location before the event
item.name: St. Anthony's Feast! Let's Mangia!
